"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5558fd766368726323470400#post_5558fd766368726323470400
This is kind of a massive spoiler for medabots for those of you that haven't watched it in years:
[spoiler]
The world is actually post-apocalypse earth.  All medabots were originally weaponry, but they went on a massive human killing spree; that's why their world is so advanced technologically but at the same time looks like modern day cause if your entire civilization gets destroyed that's going to destroy all the cool buildings and shit you had.

Essentially: humans got wiped back to the stone age and the story is actually set in thousands of years in the future.
[/spoiler]
